bike.description: High Modulus D-6 carbon w/RIB Tech, Integrated head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Integrated Aero seat tube, Internal cable routing, Oversized PIIS BB shell, Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XS (50cm), S (52cm), M (54cm), L (56cm), XL (58cm), XXL (60cm)

components.description: High Modulus D-6 carbon thin seat stays, Oversized chain stay w/ETC and forged Aluminum drop out w/replaceable hanger
FC-330 Carbon Monocoque w/RIB Tech, Tapered Carbon steerer & carbon drop out
SRAM Red, F type-Braze On Mount
SRAM Red Double Tap dual control, 20-speed
Reynolds Assault Carbon Clincher Wheelset, 46mm rim-700c
TRP R970 Magnesium Dual Pivot w/Swiss Stop Carbon Pads
Oval R-900 Carbon Alloy matrix, 31.8mm, +/-6 degrees
